markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sensitive Nose](/Feats.aspx?ID=2795) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your large black nose isn't just for show. You gain imprecise [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) with a range of 30 feet.

**Special** You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can’t retrain out of this feat or into this feat.
name: Sensitive Nose
